intro.taglineDesktop: Passionate about creating elegant designs, learning, and progression.

About.parrafoN1: My name is Mateo Campillo, I'm a web developer.
About.parrafoN2: Since I was little I knew that my career was going to develop electronically, and when I discovered web development, I fell in love completely. I feel it allows me to constantly grow and exploit my creativity.
About.parrafoN3: I am passionate about creating innovative digital solutions. I have been working on improving my full stack skills. I am always looking forwards to learning more and staying on top of the latest trends and technologies in my field.
About.parrafoN4: If you are looking for a committed developer, do not hesitate to contact me. I would love the opportunity to collaborate with you and create innovative digital solutions together.
About.parrafoN5: MERN stack and some more technologies:

infoRadiant.desc: With this project I decided to create a page that consumes an external API, prioritizing a simple and elegant design, and easy to consume information. Built with React, plus other libraries for easy navigation. API consumed via Fetch.

ecommerce.desc: Project currently in the development stage, with the aim of generating an eCommerce mockup, emphasizing interaction and design oriented towards a pleasant user experience.

textoLargo.parrafoN1: If you liked my work and you are looking for a trained professional to join your team, do not hesitate to contact me.
textoLargo.parrafoN2: I am eager to discuss how my experience and skills can contribute to the success of your project or company.
textoLargo.parrafoN3: Do not wait any longer to contact me and together we will achieve great things!

formulario.linkedIn: Or we can connect on Linkedin!

Footer: Design and development by Mateo Campillo
